name: Mekafusion #13 MF03-COMBAT-V5
description:
Model: MF03-COMBAT-V5 ( Mekanic Fusion no.3 - COMBAT V5 )
Series: RETRO

Fusions:
BS04-COMBAT ( Base Mekanoid no.04 - COMBAT )
MG-V-JET ( Meta Gear - V JET)
MG-V-DRILL ( Meta Gear - V DRILL)
MG-V-TANK ( Meta Gear - V TANK)
MG-V-ROLLER  ( Meta Gear - V ROLLER)

★ Properties
• Type: Mekafusion
• Skills: Combine, Volts In and out.
• Weapon: V Boomerang, V missiles, V Chain, V combination, V Beam
• Perks: Combination of multiple parts increases power and strength.

A Mekanic fusion in RETRO series with its unique AI to combine a Base Mekaniod and 4 Vehicle Parts to form a combined Mekafusion.

✡ It has 5 Editions infusion with 5 combination units.

⚔ The Project - Mekafusion [ Mekanic Fusion ] 
An alliance between Meka and Meta to join forces to form ultimate mechanical robotic machines in different series in the Metaverse.

These are digitally hand-drawn in 2D artwork to make Robotic Figures 'Mekanoid'. The concept comes in different series to give mechas their Artificial Intelligence to capture human character to make lots of unique Mekafusions.

The goal is to make robot designs as it was been my childhood hobby to draw robots minted in Tezos blockchain as Non-fungible Tokens (NFT) to give opportunities to art collectors and traders. Artwork is created in image 4000x4000 pixel HD resolution to satisfy its quality into an iconic figure.

You can visit me on my Twitter page as the creator of Mekafusion - @XTZverse

★★★★★
Visit webpage for more information: mekafusion.com
